svg.title: Brocc
svg.desc: Brocc (Previously named Sparlan) were founded in Stockholm in April 2014 by Jonathan Klein and Claes Melander. In November 2015, the company will be the first in Sweden to obtain permission from Finansinspektionen to mediate person-to-person loans in Sweden. The service was launched on the Swedish market in April 2016. In November 2016, the company expanded its offering to monthly savings.
